title: Integrated curriculum
creator_credit: Victoria. Schools Division. Curriculum Branch, Chris O'Rourke, Lily Steiner and Jeff Spencer
brief_description: Shows how an integrated curriculum can operate in classrooms with children ranging from preparatory to years five and six. It shows how different areas of the curriculum can be integrated to promote learning.
creator_credit_for_label: Victoria. Schools Division. Curriculum Branch, Chris O’Rourke, Lily Steiner and Jeff Spencer
description: Shows how an integrated curriculum can operate in classrooms with children ranging from preparatory to years five and six. It shows how different areas of the curriculum can be integrated to promote learning.
